metadata.name: THE EVERYTHING-STONE
metadata.description:
The first alchemical stone of the two: the Everything-stone and the Everywhere-stone.  
The shape of a hexagon, the most mystical sacred geometric shape, for it is the shape favoured by animate and inanimate nature: bee honeycombs, dragonfly eyes, tortoise shells, coral, air bubbles on water, hallucinogenic experiences - the hexagonal shape is present everywhere.  
So, take this stone - look into it carefully, slowly - you will see sunsets and sunrises, oceans and rivers, fields and forests, plains and mountains, night and day: everything around you.

NFT is one of the brightest representatives of · CRYSTALLISM  · based on a physical oil painting. 

NFT details:  
4779 х 4203 · 37 Mb
